Welcome to Grace Covenant’s web site. We hope you find it user friendly and helpful. Using the buttons on the left you can access whatever information we thought you might be interested in finding. By e-mailing our Pastor you can personalize any further question you might have. We are in the process of placing selected sermons in manuscript form under the button by that name.

We are a small church committed to a Reformed covenantal understanding of the Bible and Christian life (See “What’s in a Name”). As with most small churches, everyone is significant and valued as an important part of the body. We have a particular desire to urge and challenge and help husbands and fathers to take hold of the task God has given them to lead their families and guide the church. We have to get away from the idea that the gospel is a crutch for the weak, more suited to women and children. Indeed, “Blessed are the poor in spirit for theirs is the kingdom of heaven” (Matt.5:3). But the gospel is just as much recruitment for the Lord’s army and the coming of the kingdom. The blood of Christ takes away our guilt and gives peace with God, but the Spirit enlivens to conquer kingdoms by faith (Heb.11).

If you are visiting the beautiful Sunshine Coast, please look us up and join us for worship or Bible study. If you are moving up, or are not committed in one of the Coast churches, please visit and consider joining with us as we seek to build up the church with the prayer; “Thy kingdom come, thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven.” (Matt.6:9ff)

We are currenlty meeting at 10:00 am at:

Highland Centre
Corner of Highland Road and Highway 101
Gibsons

 

Grace Covenant Church is a Reformed Presbyterian Church on the Sunshine Coast of BC (British Columbia) - Sechelt, Gibsons, B.C.
